meanings.sent1: The old attic was the cobwebbiest place in the house.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house was so cobwebbiest that no one dared to enter.
meanings.sent3: The cobwebbiest corner of the basement seemed to have its own spider kingdom.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt cobwebbiest after a long day of not thinking clearly.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was the cobwebbiest building in town, with webs hanging from every corner.

meanings.sent1: The neglected shed in the backyard was the cobwebbiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The cobwebbiest room in the mansion was left untouched for years.
meanings.sent3: The cobwebbiest Halloween decorations won the spooky contest.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt cobwebbiest after trying to remember all the details.
meanings.sent5: The cobwebbiest tree in the forest was home to countless spiders and their webs.
